entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • All TE benchmarks regressed on ARM64 #65272
    7.0.0
  • busy hang running System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #65271

Closed

  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #48926
    Future
  • Unexpected behavior in the Parallel.ForEachAsync method #65270
  • [API Proposal]: Extension method suggestion #65267

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove {Try}HashData from AsymmetricAlgorithmHelpers #65277
    area-System.Security
  • Move more things under S.S.Cryptography. #65274
    area-System.Security
  • Improve regex optimizations around repetitions of the same character #65273
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Move Msquic over to Source-generated delegate interop. #65204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Respect single target framework values in slngen.targets #65248
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Send CA names on Linux #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Validate `IntPtr` and ByRef field overlap #65246
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing 'unnecessary assignment of a value' diagnostic #59525

Closed

  • IntelliSense is not suggesting generate method option #59251
  • Quick Actions and Refactorings: "Add parameter to constructor" in partial class replaces current file content with the file containing the constructor #59292
    17.2
  • Compiler doesn't show warning about not exhaustive switch expression #59511
  • ID0056 bad suggestion in netstandard2.0 #59514

PullRequests

Created

  • Catch more exceptions #59526
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nullable warning on conversion of anonymous function with implicit parameters #59522
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE, Next
  • IDE0056, IDE0057: Move language version check to compilation start, minor cleanup #59523
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Simplify the wrapping code for initializer-expression wrapping #59397
    Area-IDE
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSS Hot Reload Causing Browser Link Error in JS Console in Browser #40189
  • Blazor WebAssembly error "IDBFS is not defined" #40188
  • CacheTagHelper <cache> works for other elements but not for a particular view component? #40187
  • Localized views with Razor Pages #40186
  • Generate dictionary keys in blazor @bind #40185
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40184

Closed

  • IWebHostENvironment returns incorrect path when deployed to server #40162

PullRequests

Created

  • Set WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures #40183
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Updated

  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Do less copying / zipping for Helix #40134
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • MAUI Blazor hybrid apps crashing on iOS / iPadOS / macOS #3980
  • Support configurability in opening external URLs #4338
  • MenuBar #4640
  • Validate MenuItem API is complete for Desktop MacCatalyst/WinUI #1715
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • [Enhancement] Offer WPF as an option for the Windows host (especially Blazor Hybrid) #1789
    Future
  • [workload] add maui-linux-gtk or maui-gtk to speed maui+self draw solution adoption on cross desktop platform development #3564
    Future
  • [Android] App crashes when start from background #4169
  • Getting issue when trying to open a new window #4426

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IToolbar from IStackNavigationView #4654
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653

Updated

  • [WinUI] Fix Flyout Background Color and Locked Flyout Margins #4639
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4643
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
